title: The misuse shall be ascertained by physical site verification of the said Smart Fin Tech Centre policy by a team of officers from the Directorate of Information Technology and the MCGM, which has approved the building plans of the said Smart Fin Tech Centre
clause_text: The misuse shall be ascertained by physical site verification of the said Smart Fin Tech Centre policy by a team of officers from the Directorate of Information Technology and the MCGM, which has approved the building plans of the said Smart Fin Tech Centre.
section: 33(13)(A) Buildings of Smart Fin Tech Centre
